crown.name: CSK_Module_DigitalIOManager
crown.desc: This is an automatically generated CROWN (description not necessary)

crown.name: CSK_DigitalIOManager
crown.desc: Module to manage DigitalIO configurations and to provide features like signal forwarding (realized in dynamically created cFlow), signal < - > event forwarding and setting output states. + Other modules can access these features / settings. For most features it is needed to preconfigure some values and then to activate this setup. + {empty} + Typically the features of this module are used like this (check also main script of this module): + {empty} + **1) Setup of the ports** + At first, select the port you want to setup with "selectOutputInterface" or "selectInputInterface" by its ENUM, e.g. with 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.selectOutputInterface( "S1DO1" )'. + Now, you can setup the port configuration with functions like "setActivationMode" / "setActivationValue" / "setDebounceMode" / "setInputLogic" / "setOutputLogic" / "setOutputMode" / ... + IMPORTANT: To activate the predefined setup of the port, you need to call "setActiveStatusInput" / "setActiveStatusOutput", e.g. 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.setActiveStatusOutput( true )'. + {empty} + **2) Set digital output** + Via "setOutput", you can set the status of the latest selected output port. (Same like 'Connector.DigitalOut.set( ... )') + {empty} + **3) Get digital input** + Via "getInputState", you can get the status of the latest selected input port. (Same like 'Connector.DigitalIn.get( ... )') + {empty} + **4) Trigger digital output by event** + It is possible to set a digital output signal by notifiying an event. For this, you need to use "setTriggerEvent" to predefine the event to listen to (e.g. 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.setTriggerEvent( "CrownName.OnNewResult" )'). The event needs to provide a bool value as first parameter to define the status to set. + Additionally, it is necessary to define which port should be set by the function "setOutputToTrigger", e.g. by 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.setOutputToTrigger( "S1DO1" )'. + This will become active by calling 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.addTriggerEvent()'. + If the event will raise, the digital output signal will be set by the forwarded bool value of the event. It will use the configuration of the port setup. + That means for example, if the output port is configured with OutputMode = "PUSH_PULL", Logic = "ACTIVE_HIGH", ActivationMode = "TIME_MS", ActivationValue = "100", and the event is notified with "true", the output port will be active for 100ms. + (INFO: If configured time is not "0" (keep signal), internally it will call automatically 'Connector.DigitalOut.set( status )' followed by 'Connector.DigitalOut.set( not status )', so it is not necessary to call the event twice to reset the status ...). + To remove this "Event2Trigger"-pair, you need to select this pair via "selectOutputToSetByEventPair" and then to call "removeTriggerEvent". + {empty} + **5) Forward digital input signals via event** + It is possible to forward the status of the digital input signal to register on this by other modules (check docu of 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.OnNewInputStateENUM'-event). + For this, you need to select the specific port via "setInputToForward", e.g. 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.setInputToForward( "S2DI1" )'. + By calling then "addForwardEvent", it will forward new states of this port in the event like 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.OnNewInputStateS2DI1'. + To remove this "Input2Event"-pair, you need to select this pair via "selectForwardInputToEventPair" and then call "removeForwardEvent". + {empty} + **6) Link different ports** + It is possible to link different ports with each other (like a wire inside of a flow). This will be handled as a cFlow. + For this, you need to configure the ports you want to link via "setInputForLink" / "setOutputForLink". Additionally, you can set a delay via "setDelayForLink". + To activate the predefined link, you need to call 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.addLink()'. + The input signal will be as well forwarded via the 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.OnNewFlowInputStateENUM'-event (e.g. to use in other scripts, see docu of this event). + To remove this link, you need to select this link via "selectLink" and then to call "removeLink". +

item.desc: The activation value will be based on time in milliseconds.
item.name: TIME_MS

item.desc: The activation value will be based on increments in ticks.
item.name: INCREMENT_TICK

item.desc: The debounce value will be based on time in milliseconds.
item.name: TIME_MS

item.desc: The debounce value will be based on increments in ticks.
item.name: INCREMENT_TICK

enum.name: SignalLogic
enum.desc: Signal logic of digital input / output signal.

item.desc: Active high signal logic is used.
item.name: ACTIVE_HIGH

item.desc: Active low signal logic is used.
item.name: ACTIVE_LOW

item.desc: Digital port works as high-side (PNP) output.
item.name: HIGH_SIDE

item.desc: Digital port works as low-side (NPN) output.
item.name: LOW_SIDE

item.desc: Digital port works as push-pull output.
item.name: PUSH_PULL

event.name: OnNewStatusLoadParameterOnReboot
event.desc: Notify status if parameters should be loaded on app / device boot up.

event.name: OnPersistentDataModuleAvailable
event.desc: Notify status if features of CSK_PersistentData module are available.

event.name: OnDataLoadedOnReboot
event.desc: Event to call if module tried to load parameters and should be ready.

event.name: OnNewOutputPortTable
event.desc: Notify list of available output interfaces and the according settings (used for the UI table).

event.name: OnNewInputPortTable
event.desc: Notify list of available input interfaces and the according settings (used for the UI table).

event.name: OnNewActiveStatusInput
event.desc: Notify activation status of currently selected input port.

event.name: OnNewDebounceMode
event.desc: Notify debounce mode of currently selected input port.

event.name: OnNewDebounceValue
event.desc: Notify debounce value of currently selected input port in milliseconds / ticks.

event.name: OnNewInputLogic
event.desc: Notify signal logic of currently selected input port.

event.name: OnNewActiveStatusOutput
event.desc: Notify activation status of currently selected output port.

event.name: OnNewActivationMode
event.desc: Notify activation mode of currently selected output port.

event.name: OnNewActivationValue
event.desc: Notify activation value of currently selected output port in milliseconds / ticks.

event.name: OnNewOutputLogic
event.desc: Notify signal logic of currently selected output port.

event.name: OnNewOutputMode
event.desc: Notify output mode of currently selected output port.

event.name: OnNewInputSelection
event.desc: Notify currently selected input interface.

event.name: OnNewOutputSelection
event.desc: Notify currently selected output interface.

event.name: OnNewLinkSelected
event.desc: Notify selected link in UI table list.

event.name: OnNewInputPortList
event.desc: Notify list of available input interfaces.

event.name: OnNewOutputPortList
event.desc: Notify list of available output interfaces.

event.name: OnNewInputForLinkSelected
event.desc: Notify currently selected input interface to use for new links (see "addLink").

event.name: OnNewOutputForLinkSelected
event.desc: Notify currently selected output interface to use for new links (see "addLink").

event.name: OnNewLinkList
event.desc: Notify list of currently active links (cFlow) (e.g. for UI table).

event.name: OnNewMessageType
event.desc: Notify current message type of UI callout.

event.name: OnNewInternalMessage
event.desc: Notify internal messages.

event.name: OnShowInternalMessages
event.desc: Notify if internal message should be shown.

event.name: OnNewForwardTriggerList
event.desc: Notify list of configured input interfaces and their related events to call.

event.name: OnNewSetOutputByEventList
event.desc: Notify list of triggerEvents (triggerEvent names + related digital output signals to be set), e.g. for table in UI.

event.name: OnNewForwardEvent
event.desc: Notify current event name to use for forwarding a digital input signal (currently not used, default eventnames are used like 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.OnNewInputState[portName]').

event.name: OnNewTriggerEvent
event.desc: Notify current eventname to be set for listening to set related output interface (see "addTriggerEvent").

param.desc: Event name to wait for as trigger
param.name: event

event.name: OnNewInputToForward
event.desc: Notify selected input port to forward "OnChange" status via event.

event.name: OnNewOutputToTrigger
event.desc: Notify currently preselected output interface to use (set) for a trigger event (see "addTriggerEvent").

event.name: OnNewLinkDelay
event.desc: Notify delay time of currently selected link in milliseconds.

event.name: OnNewInputStateENUM
event.desc: Example for dynamically created event to forward an incoming digital input signal if configured (see "addForwardEvent"). + "ENUM" is replaced by DigitalInPort ENUM (e.g. 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.OnNewInputStateS1DI1'). + INFO: As this event will be created dynamically, there is no auto completion within SICK AppStudio available for such an event.

event.name: OnNewInputToForwardDataInfo
event.desc: Notify data information text of selected input port to forward "OnChange" status via event.

event.name: OnNewEventList
event.desc: Notify lists of configured forward events and related data information texts (see "addForwardEvent").

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleIsActive
event.desc: Notify if module can be used on device.

event.name: OnUserLevelOperatorActive
event.desc: Status of Operator userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelMaintenanceActive
event.desc: Status of Maintenance userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelServiceActive
event.desc: Status of Service userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelAdminActive
event.desc: Status of Admin userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnNewParameterName
event.desc: Notify name of persistent data parameter.

event.name: OnNewFlowInputStateENUM
event.desc: Example for dynamically created event to forward an incoming digital input signal if used within a link (see "addLink"). + "ENUM" is replaced by DigitalInPort ENUM (e.g. 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.OnNewFlowInputStateS1DI1'). + This event will be created during runtime if a signal link is used. So for users of this event, it is necessary to check first if this event is already available to be able to register to it. + INFO: As this event will be created dynamically, there is no auto completion within SICK AppStudio available for such an event.

event.name: OnNewStatusTrackInputSignalStatus
event.desc: Notify if status of digital input signals should be tracked for UI.

function.name: setParameterName
function.desc: Function to set the name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module.

function.name: sendParameters
function.desc: Send parameters to CSK_PersistentData module if possible to save them.

function.name: loadParameters
function.desc: Load parameters for this module from the CSK_PersistentData module if possible and use them.

function.name: setLoadOnReboot
function.desc: Configure if this module should load its saved parameters at app / device boot up

function.name: pageCalled
function.desc: Function to register "OnResume" of the module UI (only as helper function).

return.desc: Empty string (only needed to simplify binding).
return.name: empty

function.name: selectOutputInterface
function.desc: Select output interface to configure settings (e.g. in UI table).

function.name: selectInputInterface
function.desc: Select input interface to configure settings (e.g. in UI table).

function.name: setActiveStatusInput
function.desc: Set if selected input interface should be active.

function.name: setDebounceMode
function.desc: Set debounce mode of selected input interface.

function.name: setDebounceValue
function.desc: Set debounce value of selected input interface in milliseconds / ticks.

function.name: setInputLogic
function.desc: Set signal logic of selected input interface.

function.name: setActiveStatusOutput
function.desc: Set if selected output interface should be active.

function.name: setActivationMode
function.desc: Set activation mode of selected output interface.

function.name: setActivationValue
function.desc: Set activation value of selected output interface in milliseconds / ticks.

function.name: setOutputLogic
function.desc: Set signal logic of selected output interface.

function.name: setOutputMode
function.desc: Set output mode of selected output interface.

function.name: setInputForLink
function.desc: Preset input interface to use for new link (see "addLink").

function.name: setOutputForLink
function.desc: Set output interface to forward as event (see "addForwardEvent").

function.name: selectLink
function.desc: Select link (e.g. in UI table).

function.name: addLink
function.desc: Add link (via cFlow) from preset digital input signal to digital output signal.

function.name: removeLink
function.desc: Remove preselected link (from cFlow).

function.name: setDelayForLink
function.desc: Set optional delay for link in cFlow.

function.name: setInputToForward
function.desc: Set input interface to forward as event (see "addForwardEvent").

function.name: setOutputToTrigger
function.desc: Preset output interface to set if registered triggerEvent (see "addTriggerEvent").

function.name: setForwardEvent
function.desc: Preset event name to notify if registering a digital input signal (currently not used, event names are used by default, like 'CSK_DigitalIOManager.OnNewInputState[portName]').

function.name: setTriggerEvent
function.desc: Preset event name to listen to (see "addTriggerEvent").

function.name: addForwardEvent
function.desc: Add event to forward an incoming digital input signal.

function.name: addTriggerEvent
function.desc: Add event to listen to and to trigger a digital output signal.

function.name: selectForwardInputToEventPair
function.desc: Select Input2Event-pair.

param.desc: 'Input2Event'-pair to select (via UI selection or port identifier like 'S1DI1').
param.name: selection

function.name: selectOutputToSetByEventPair
function.desc: Select Event2Trigger-pair.

param.desc: 'Event2Trigger'-pair to select (via UI selection or port identifier like 'S1DO1').
param.name: selection

function.name: removeTriggerEvent
function.desc: Remove event to trigger a digital output signal.

function.name: removeForwardEvent
function.desc: Remove event to forward an incoming digital input signal.

function.name: setOutput
function.desc: Set status of currently selected output port.

function.name: getInputState
function.desc: Get current status of preselected input interface.

function.name: setInputToForwardDataInfo
function.desc: Set data information text of selected input interface to forward "OnChange" status as event (see "addForwardEvent").

function.name: getForwardEventList
function.desc: Return lists of configured forward events and related data information texts (see "addForwardEvent").

function.name: freeSensorPort
function.desc: Function to free a blocked sensor port to be available again for this module.

function.name: blockSensorPort
function.desc: Function to block a sensor port so that it can be used by other applications.

function.name: setInputTracking
function.desc: Function to set if digital input signals should be tracked to show their states in UI. + INFO: Recommended to leave it switched off, if not essentially required!
